content: blue sky fibers complimentary pattern portland cap design by mary pranica no 3304 prairie sky color shown experience level - advanced beginner materials - woolstok tweed aran 85% highland wool 15% donegal 100g/109yds 1 hank - size 10 6mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 10 6mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch marker - tapestry needle - cable needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 19 relaxed - height 9 gauge - in rib 17 sts and 19 row = 4 abbreviations portland cap no 202235 cn cable needle design by mary pranica pattern co cast on k knit this classic cozy and ribbed cap is punctuated with a round of k2tog knit 2 stitches together cables and knit with one hank of woolstok tweed lh left hand meas measures ndl s needle s p purl p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place marker rem remaining repeat repeat round s round s sl slip complimentary pattern blue sky fibers ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches separately knitwise insert left needle in front of 2 slipped stitches knit 2 slipped stitches together * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle cap will use most of the hank continue to check both stitch and row gauge throughout cap co 80 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 21 more times or until piece meas 5¼ from the co edge round 23 *sl 4 sts to the cn and hold to the front k2 sl p sts back to the lh ndl p these 2 sts k2 sts from the cn p2 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 12 more times or until piece meas 8½ from the co edge crown shaping round 1 *k2 p2tog repeat from * to end 60 sts round 2 *k2 p1 repeat from * to end round 3 *ssk p1 repeat from * to end 40 sts round 4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end round 5 *ssk p2tog repeat from * to end 20 sts round 6 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end round 7 *k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull to close finishing weave in ends block as desired care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2022 this pattern is copyrighted
